mapper.sql: TRAILER_ID, TRAILER_CODE, TRAILER_NAME, BRAND_ID, TRAILER_TYPE, CARGO_TYPE, TRAILER_LONG, TRAILER_WIDTH, TRAILER_HIGH, TRAILER_WEIGHT, FULL_WEIGHT, PRICE, ORIGIN, SUPPLIER_ID, MAX_QUANTITY, LAYER, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG

where trailer.del = 0 and trailer.TRAILER_ID = #{trailerId} and trailer.TRAILER_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{trailerCode},'%') and trailer.TRAILER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{trailerName},'%') and trailer.BRAND_ID = #{brandId} and trailer.TRAILER_TYPE = #{trailerType} and trailer.CARGO_TYPE = #{cargoType} and trailer.TRAILER_LONG = #{trailerLong} and trailer.TRAILER_WIDTH = #{trailerWidth} and trailer.TRAILER_HIGH = #{trailerHigh} and trailer.TRAILER_WEIGHT = #{trailerWeight} and trailer.FULL_WEIGHT = #{fullWeight} and trailer.PRICE = #{price} and trailer.ORIGIN = #{origin} and trailer.SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId} and trailer.MAX_QUANTITY = #{maxQuantity} and trailer.LAYER = #{layer} and trailer.BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus} and trailer.CREATOR = #{creator} and trailer.CREATE_TIME = #{createTime} and trailer.CHECKER = #{checker} and trailer.CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate} and trailer.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and trailer.FLAG = #{flag} and (trailer.TRAILER_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') or trailer.TRAILER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') or brand.BRAND_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') ) and trailer.CREATE_TIME >= #{startTime} and trailer.CREATE_TIME <= #{endTime} and trailer.CHECK_DATE >= #{startCheckDate} and trailer.CHECK_DATE <= #{endCheckDate} and brand.BRAND_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{refBrandName},'%')
mapper.select: select FROM bd_trailer trailer JOIN bd_brand brand ON trailer.BRAND_ID=brand.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp corp ON trailer.SUPPLIER_ID=corp.CORP_ID JOIN bd_user us ON trailer.CREATOR=us.USER_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user u ON trailer.CHECKER=u.USER_ID JOIN sys_corp c ON trailer.CORP_ID=c.CORP_ID where trailer.TRAILER_ID = #{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update BD_TRAILER set DEL=1 where TRAILER_ID = #{trailerId}
update BD_TRAILER set DEL=1 where TRAILER_ID in #{trailerId}
mapper.insert: insert into BD_TRAILER (TRAILER_CODE, TRAILER_NAME, BRAND_ID, TRAILER_TYPE, CARGO_TYPE, TRAILER_LONG, TRAILER_WIDTH, TRAILER_HIGH, TRAILER_WEIGHT, FULL_WEIGHT, PRICE, ORIGIN, SUPPLIER_ID, MAX_QUANTITY, LAYER, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{trailerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trailerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trailerType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cargoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trailerLong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trailerWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trailerHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trailerWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fullWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{layer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into BD_TRAILER TRAILER_CODE, TRAILER_NAME, BRAND_ID, TRAILER_TYPE, CARGO_TYPE, TRAILER_LONG, TRAILER_WIDTH, TRAILER_HIGH, TRAILER_WEIGHT, FULL_WEIGHT, PRICE, ORIGIN, SUPPLIER_ID, MAX_QUANTITY, LAYER, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{trailerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trailerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{trailerType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cargoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trailerLong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trailerWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trailerHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{trailerWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{fullWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{layer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update BD_TRAILER TRAILER_CODE = #{trailerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAILER_NAME = #{trailerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRAILER_TYPE = #{trailerType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARGO_TYPE = #{cargoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRAILER_LONG = #{trailerLong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRAILER_WIDTH = #{trailerWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRAILER_HIGH = #{trailerHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRAILER_WEIGHT = #{trailerWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, FULL_WEIGHT = #{fullWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORIGIN = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MAX_QUANTITY = #{maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LAYER = #{layer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where TRAILER_ID = #{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update BD_TRAILER set TRAILER_CODE = #{trailerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRAILER_NAME = #{trailerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRAND_ID = #{brandId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, TRAILER_TYPE = #{trailerType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARGO_TYPE = #{cargoType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRAILER_LONG = #{trailerLong,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRAILER_WIDTH = #{trailerWidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRAILER_HIGH = #{trailerHigh,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TRAILER_WEIGHT = #{trailerWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, FULL_WEIGHT = #{fullWeight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, PRICE = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORIGIN = #{origin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MAX_QUANTITY = #{maxQuantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LAYER = #{layer,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where TRAILER_ID = #{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select FROM bd_trailer trailer LEFT JOIN bd_brand brand ON trailer.BRAND_ID=brand.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp corp ON trailer.SUPPLIER_ID=corp.CORP_ID JOIN bd_user us ON trailer.CREATOR=us.USER_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user u ON trailer.CHECKER=u.USER_ID JOIN sys_corp c ON trailer.CORP_ID=c.CORP_ID order by trailer.CREATE_TIME DESC
mapper.update: update BD_TRAILER set BILL_STATUS=1,CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TRAILER_ID = #{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT trailer.TRAILER_ID AS trailerId,trailer.TRAILER_NAME AS trailerName,brand.BRAND_ID AS brandId,brand.BRAND_NAME AS brandName, trailer.MAX_QUANTITY AS maxQuantity FROM bd_trailer trailer LEFT JOIN bd_brand brand ON trailer.BRAND_ID=brand.BRAND_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp corp ON trailer.SUPPLIER_ID=corp.CORP_ID JOIN bd_user us ON trailer.CREATOR=us.USER_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user u ON trailer.CHECKER=u.USER_ID JOIN sys_corp c ON trailer.CORP_ID=c.CORP_ID order by ${orderByClause}
select from bd_trailer where del = 0 and flag = 0 and TRAILER_ID in #{trailerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
